column5: Very family friendly cottage in a family oriented neighborhood.  Less 3 miles from Allen Premium Outlets Very close to 121/Sam Rayburn Tollway Fire station is less than a mile away on Alma Rd.  24 Hour E-care are 2 miles away on Custer and Off of Eldorado.  Grocery Stores - Kroger is less than 3 miles on Custer.  Walmart is less than 2 miles on McKinney Ranch Pkwy.  Aldi is on Stacy, you can walk there too.  No public transportation nearby
